name: Fruit of the Loom Women's No Show Socks, 10 Pack

reviews.name: Fruit of the Loom Women's No Show Socks, 10 Pack
reviews.title: walbarr

reviews.name: Fruit of the Loom Women's No Show Socks, 10 Pack
reviews.reviewText:
I ordered these socks because I was looking for cotton. The description led me to believe that these would be cotton only.. soft, breathable, cotton...
as it does not disclose they they are 80% cotton, 18% polyester, 1% spandex, and 1% other.
I am looking for spandex-free, so I was disappointed.
I was also expecting full cushion support, as that is also in the description. These have no cushion.
They will do, but they were not what I was looking for, and not as described.
reviews.title: not as described, but they will do

reviews.name: Fruit of the Loom Women's No Show Socks, 10 Pack
reviews.reviewText: The items received in a timely manner. They are what I ordered. This is a gift for CHRISTMAS . I'm very satisfied with product and am sure the one it is for will be also.
reviews.title: Great!

reviews.name: Fruit of the Loom Women's No Show Socks, 10 Pack
reviews.reviewText: The socks were poor quality. Not only did they not wear good, a couple came with holes already in them.
reviews.title: built in holes
